original_title: Ex-State Minister Prasanna Ranaweera further remanded
original_body_lines: Former State Minister Prasanna Ranaweera has been remanded until August 25 by the Mahara Magistrate’s Court, Ada Derana reporter said.
Ranaweera and several others were arrested and remanded for allegedly selling a plot of state-owned land in Kiribathgoda to a private party by forging documents.
